artiste: Rem Koolhaas, Elia Zenghelis, Madelon Vriesendorp, Zoe Zenghelis
artisteBio: Dutch, born 1944, British, born Greece 1937, Dutch, born 1945, British, born Greece 1937
title: Exodus, or the Voluntary Prisoners of Architecture: The Strip (Aerial Perspective)
